00033 #include "SlaveBoundaryVertices.hpp"

00042 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00043 
00044 SlaveBoundaryVertices::SlaveBoundaryVertices( unsigned depth, unsigned dim )
00045   : elemDepth(depth), domainDoF(dim)
00046   {}
00047 
00048 std::string SlaveBoundaryVertices::get_name() const
00049   { return "SlaveBoundaryVertices"; }
00050 
00051 double SlaveBoundaryVertices::loop_over_mesh( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00052                                               const Settings* settings,
00053                                               MsqError& err )
00054 {
00055   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00056   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00057 
00058   if (settings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() != Settings::SLAVE_CALCULATED) {
00059     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Request to calculate higher-order node slaved status "
00060                     "when Settings::get_get_slaved_ho_node_mode() "
00061                     "!= SLAVE_CALCUALTED", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00062     return 0.0;
00063   }
00064   
00065     // If user said that we should treat fixed vertices as the
00066     // boundary, but specified that fixed vertices are defined
00067     // by the dimension of their geometric domain, then just
00068     // do distance from the geometric domain.
00069   int dim = this->domainDoF;
00070   if (dim >= 4 && settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode() != Settings::FIXED_FLAG)
00071     dim = settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode();
00072   
00073     // Create a map to contain vertex depth.  Intiliaze all to 
00074     // elemDepth+1.
00075   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00076   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00077   if (vertices.empty())
00078     return 0.0;
00079   std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
00080   std::vector<unsigned short> depth( vertices.size(), elemDepth+1 );
00081   std::vector<bool> fixed;
00082   mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( arrptr(vertices), fixed, vertices.size(), err );
00083   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00084   
00085     // Initialize map with boundary vertices.
00086   if (dim >= 4) {
00087     for(size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
00088       if (fixed[i])
00089         depth[i] = 0;
00090   }
00091   else {
00092     if (!domain) {
00093       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Request to calculate higher-order node slaved status "
00094                       "by distance from bounding domain without a domain.",
00095                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00096       return 0.0;
00097     }
00098     
00099     std::vector<unsigned short> dof( vertices.size() );
00100     domain->domain_DoF( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(dof), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00101     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
00102       if (dof[i] <= dim)
00103         depth[i] = 0;
00104   }
00105   
00106     // Now iterate over elements repeatedly until we've found all of the 
00107     // elements near the boundary.  This could be done much more efficiently
00108     // using vertex-to-element adjacencies, but it is to common for 
00109     // applications not to implement that unless doing relaxation smoothing.
00110     // This is O(elemDepth * elements.size() * ln(vertices.size()));
00111   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00112   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::const_iterator j, k;
00113   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> conn;
00114   std::vector<size_t> junk(2);
00115   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00116   if (elements.empty())
00117     return 0.0;
00118   bool some_changed;
00119   do {
00120     some_changed = false;
00121     for (j = elements.begin(); j != elements.end(); ++j) {
00122       conn.clear(); junk.clear();
00123       mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*j, 1, conn, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00124       unsigned short elem_depth = elemDepth+1;
00125       for (k = conn.begin(); k != conn.end(); ++k) {
00126         size_t i = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), *k ) - vertices.begin();
00127         if (i == vertices.size()) {
00128           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle in element connectivity list.", 
00129                           MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00130           return 0.0;
00131         }
00132         if (depth[i] < elem_depth)
00133           elem_depth = depth[i];
00134       }
00135       if (elem_depth == elemDepth+1)
00136         continue;
00137       
00138       ++elem_depth;
00139       for (k = conn.begin(); k != conn.end(); ++k) {
00140         size_t i = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), *k ) - vertices.begin();
00141         if (depth[i] > elem_depth) {
00142           depth[i] = elem_depth;
00143           some_changed = true;
00144         }
00145       }
00146     } // for(elements)
00147   } while (some_changed);
00148   
00149     // Now remove any corner vertices from the slaved set
00150   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator p;
00151   std::vector<EntityTopology> types(elements.size());
00152   mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elements), arrptr(types), elements.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00153   for (j = elements.begin(); j != elements.end(); ++j) {
00154     const unsigned corners = TopologyInfo::corners(types[j-elements.begin()]);
00155     conn.clear(); junk.clear();
00156     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*j, 1, conn, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00157     for (unsigned i = 0; i < corners; ++i) {
00158       p = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), conn[i] );
00159       depth[p-vertices.begin()] = 0;
00160     }
00161   }
00162   
00163     // Now mark all vertices *not* within specified depth as slave vertices.
00164   std::vector<unsigned char> bytes( vertices.size() );
00165   mesh->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(bytes), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00166   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
00167     if (depth[i] <= elemDepth || fixed[i])
00168       bytes[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00169     else
00170       bytes[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00171   }
00172   
00173   mesh->vertices_set_byte( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(bytes), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00174   return 0.0;
00175 }

00177 void SlaveBoundaryVertices::initialize_queue( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00178                                               const Settings* ,
00179                                               MsqError&  )
00180 {
00181 }
